name: Word
description: Meaning

name: COMMOTION
description: A state of confused and noisy disturbance

name: RETRACT
description: To pull back/to take back

name: DISGUISE
description: Give someone a different appearance in order to conceal ones identity

name: BAFFLE
description: To confuse

name: DISCREET
description: Careful and prudent in ones speech or actions

name: VULNERABLE
description: Exposed to the possibility of being attacked or harmed

name: HAGGLE
description: To bargain in a petty

name: CONTENTIOUS
description: Causing or likely to cause an argument

name: REPLENISH
description: Fill something up again

name: RECUPERATE
description: Recover from illness or exertion

name: OBLIVIOUS
description: Not aware of or concerned about what is happening around one

name: PARAMOUNT
description: More important than anything else

name: ELOQUENT
description: Fluent or persuasive in speaking or writing

name: AMBIGUOUS
description: Not having one obvious meaning

name: DILIGENT
description: Attentive and persistent in doing anything

name: UNSOLICITED
description: Given or supplied without being requested or asked for

name: CLAIRVOYANT
description: Forecaster of the future

name: SERENDIPITY
description: The occurrence of events by chance in a happy or beneficial way

name: PIVOTAL
description: Of crucial importance

name: OBNOXIOUS
description: Highly objectionable or offensive, extremely unpleasant

name: LUDICROUS
description: Unreasonable and foolish

name: EXHILARATE
description: Make someone feel very happy

name: ATROCIOUS
description: Extremely or shockingly wicked, cruel, or brutal

name: SCRUTINIZE
description: Examine or inspect closely and thoroughly.

name: WHEEDLE
description: Use endearments or flattery to persuade someone to do something

name: DETRIMENTAL
description: Tending to cause harm

name: SUBJECTIVE
description: Based on or influenced by personal feelings, tastes, or opinions

name: EVOKE
description: Bring or recall (a feeling, memory, or image) to the conscious mind.

name: DESPICABLE
description: Deserving hatred and contempt

name: HINDER
description: Make it difficult for someone to do something

name: UNILATERAL
description: Relating to or affecting only one side

name: AMBIGUOUS
description: Not clear or decided

name: PHENOMENAL
description: Remarkable or exceptional, especially exceptionally good.

name: IREVOCABLY
description: In a way that cannot be changed, reversed, or recovered

name: EXCRUCIATING
description: Intensely painful

name: GREGARIOUS
description: Fond of the company of others; sociable

name: HEDONIST
description: A pleasure-seeker

name: INDELICATE
description: Having or showing a lack of sensitive understanding or tact

name: MALINGER
description: Pretend to be ill in order to escape duty or work

name: NIRVANA
description: An ideal or idyllic state or place

name: INSIDIOUS
description: Proceeding in a gradual, subtle way, but with very harmful effects

name: PEEVISH
description: Showing annoyance, irritation, or bad mood

name: UBIQUITOUS
description: Existing or being everywhere, especially at the same time

name: ECCENTRIC
description: Unconventional and slightly strange

name: NAP
description: Sleep lightly or briefly, especially during the day.

name: IMMACULATE
description: Perfectly clean, neat, or tidy

name: FLIMSY
description: Light and insubstantial, easily damaged

name: COUNTERFEIT
description: Exact imitation of something valuable with the intention to deceive

name: BREACH
description: An act of breaking a law, agreement, or code of conduct

name: DISCOMFIT
description: Feel uneasy or embarrassed

name: ELUSIVE
description: Difficult to find, catch, or achieve.

name: CHARISMA
description: Compelling attractiveness or charm that can inspire devotion in others

name: INGENIOUS
description: Clever, original, and inventive

name: UNWHOLESOME
description: Unhealthy

name: PRAGMATIC
description: Dealing with things sensibly and realistically

name: SCARCE
description: Insufficient for the demand

name: EMINENT
description: Famous and respected

name: CUTTHROAT
description: Fierce and intense; involving the use of ruthless measures
